course_title: Management of Acute and Chronic Illness II
course_description: The second course in a two-course series expands clinical reasoning skills of the nurse practitioner student in managing acute/episodic and chronic health conditions of adults presenting in a variety of settings.
prerequisites: NRSG 517 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
